dimensions.ndim: Number of dimensions. This is always 4.
dimensions.zSize2: Number of pixels along the 4th dimension for a 4D file (e.g. SPED).
dimensions.zSize: Number of pixels along the 3rd dimension for a 3D file.
dimensions.ySize: Number of pixels along the 2nd dimension (y-axis).
dimensions.xSize: Number of pixels along the 1st dimension (x-axis).

data.description: Image data. Note that the indexing starts with the 4th dimension. For a 2D image, zSize2 and zSize will be one.

pixelUnit.description: The unit name as a string for each dimension of each dataset.

pixelSize.description: The real size of the pixel. Real and reciprical space are supported.

metadata.description: A json dump of relevant metadata tags.
